website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality smoker if you're looking to smoke a lot of food at once.
pros: Includes seven cooking grids, including four standard grids, two jerky grids, one rib rack, and one sausage hanger
Dual-door design makes it easy to add wood and liquid without losing heat
Includes a viewing window in the top door
cons: Model leaks some smoke unless you buy a separate gasket

customer_reviews.title: Hardware Missing
customer_reviews.text: Hardware missing. Makes the whole thing a pile of junk, with my back porch littered with the junk I'm trying to assemble. Does Smoke Hollow have any customer service presence on Amazon, other than selling? If so, I haven't heard from you. Amazon's resolution to the missing nuts/bolts was to send me an assortment pack of nuts/bolts that may or may not be heat treated, and questionable whether safe to use them in a device to cook food people consume. How about getting back with me, Smoke Hollow, and send the hardware that should have originally came with this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Upgraded from a 5yr old 1 burner master-built
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice now. First time filled all racks. About 60 pounds of meat. Got to 225 degree's quickly. The bottom rack gets very hot. I rotated the meat half way through the smoke. Second round was about 30 pounds. Smoked 5 hrs. Moved bottom rack up about 4 inches. Finished off next day in crock pots cuz in a hurry. Worked great. Upgraded from a 5yr old 1 burner master-built. Would definitely recommend. Very pleased. Needed to open top vent at least 2 inched to keep the right burner from going out. The wood bins are better suited for chips, not chunks. Although smaller chunks work. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: tim lawson

customer_reviews.title: Everything turned out great! It was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This things a beast! My old backyard smoker was about half this size. After seasoning it I filled it with three racks of pork ribs, six chicken leg quarters, six ears of corn and six packs of mixed veggies (potatoes, carrots, onions & peppers). Everything turned out great! It was very easy to assemble. My only complaint was one of the sides was dented upon delivery. I was able to straighten it out without much effort and have not seen any problems from it. The door leaks a little, but that can be fixed with a little LavaLock High Temp Nomex BBQ Gasket.
customer_reviews.author: John Burkett

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase--I bought one for my sons birthday, and its very well constructed. I added the 1/2 by 1/8 lavalock gasket around the doors which also worked great. I also added 3 walls on the side and rear legs because he is in a windy area. I have had several smokers over the years but this is far better than those---I may have to get one for myself. The temp gauge was broken so I called the service number and another was sent out. So I used my meat probe hanging thru the smoke stack to read the temp until it arrived. I rarely use the drip pan supplied, I prefer to use heavy duty aluminum throw away trays
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee Mount

customer_reviews.title: Nooo customer support 😡😡😡😠
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 44241GW in July 2020 from day one the right burner would not stay lit now can hardly keep either burner lit. Wood chip trays are cheap and after one use they are warped. I have tried contacting masterbuilt/smoke hollow via email several times no response.spoke with Amazon and they are willing to ship a new one but after sealing both doors with lavalock gasket and high temp silicone on every little crack while assembling and buying and installing a stainless steel probe port all that time and money lost because I can't seem to get a response from the manufacturer. What I thought was going to be my best smoker turns out to be a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Patbain

customer_reviews.title: This is the best purchase I've done so far.
customer_reviews.text: After paying $10 for smoked salmon at whole foods and endless amounts of money on other smoked delis, this item changed everything. I create my own meat, chicken and seafood recipes and smoke them up. You can choose ANY intensity you wish and insert wood of many flavors in it. Most importantly, it is SUPER EASY TO USE and the storage amount in there is insane. You can literally smoke food in it to feed 60 people. Please note: This item isn't suitable for you in case you reside in an apartment building and wish to operate it in your balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker, but there's some work to do
customer_reviews.text: I really like this smoker. It's easy to use, and we've made some great food. However, it has some negatives. First, the glass front will get dirty pretty quickly, and you'll need to clean it regularly if you want to be able to actually see the food. Second, you'll probably need to use something to seal the open seams between the metal pieces in order to conserve heat/smoke. Third, you'll need some Nomex/heat resistant liners to seal the door. I still love this smoker. I don't plan on getting another one until the this smoker's life has been spent. Just realize that there's some work to do on it if you get one.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker for the price, can cook a lot of meat at one time.
customer_reviews.text: Smoker work well, smoked 8 slabs of ribs, 40 chicken strips, 30 chicken legs all at one time, I done all the suggestions like sealing with sealer all seems during assembly, bought the recommended seal for the doors, i did not have a problem keeping the burners light, wood chip trays worked ok, if you follow the instructions you will have a very good smoker for a reasonable price, I am very pleased with this smoker, my family enjoyed the Food.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Propane Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations. I’ve been smoking for years with an offset, but I’m starting to get lazy! This thing is enormous and on my second smoke I did 6 racks of ribs, 5 lbs of pork chops, a 12lb Salmon and 10lbs of potatoes and still had a couple shelves to spare. I was very surprised that I could still get a good bark on my ribs and briskets! I highly recommend for doing a lot of food. It’s too big to use for a single rack of ribs or half a pork loin as you’d use a lot less propane on a smaller smoker. I’m using around a pound of propane an hour on average.
customer_reviews.author: CALTechnologiesLLC

customer_reviews.title: Best. Smoker. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it three times in the month that I've had it. Once for a 6 hour rib smoke, a two hour smoke for 40# of home made bacon, and a 16 hour brisket smoke. The smoker performed perfectly. It held the temperature at all times (well, except when my chips flamed up once) and was easy to set up for each smoke. Lots of shelves/racks, so you can load it up and smoke several meals at once, or one big party worth. I wish there were ports to run thermometers through, but I snaked it down the chimney and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: T. W. Gray

customer_reviews.title: won't stay lite
customer_reviews.text: Stupid thing won't stay lite, just replaced the regulator and still no gas comes through. Not long after I bought it the lighter stopped working. It's too dirty/greasy to get under it and take it apart to fix, too old to do all that work. guess it will end up at the curb for a younger buck to take home and find out it won't work. Ruined a nice brisket for me.. grrrr.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Speed

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in July and have had issues with the left burner staying lit. Reached out to Smoke Hollow and was informed that their regulator has a safety pin that will shut off the flow of propane if you open the propane tank to full before you light the burners. This is, in my opinion, a poor design that needs to be corrected by the manufacturer so that the average user is not frustrated trying to keep the smoker fires burning.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Baker

customer_reviews.title: Left Burner Won't Stay Lit
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and flexibility of the temperatures that I can smoke at. About the sixth time I started to smoke a turkey, I could not keep the temperature at 350. I then realized the left burner kept going out no matter how much or how little I kept the side damper. I don't know if the issue is with the burner or the gas control. It lights, burns for a few minutes and then goes out. Right now I am only capable of smoking at lower temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: James Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Hubby LOVES this smoker.  He swears it's the best one he's ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Everything he's smoked has turned out so good, ham, sausage, chicken wings, ribs, shrimp, etc. So easy to get to everything in the smoker. Can't wait until the mullet are running. Hubby's smoke mullet is the best I've ever tasted. One of our best purchases this year.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Smoke Hollow 44"
customer_reviews.text: Been using this smoker every once a week for the last two months. Can't believe I waited all these years to finally buy a vertical smoker. The process couldn't be easier. The Smoke Hollow 44" might sound too large but it is the perfect size. Best purchase I have made for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Willdoggz

customer_reviews.title: Work's good
customer_reviews.text: Well I've had this now for about 3 weeks. First cook I made ribs then I made 2 turkeys. And 25lbs of venison bologna that came out great. Just got done with a batch of jurky and have had no trouble at all. Temps from 165 to 350
customer_reviews.author: Old. Dog

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: Smoker is really nice and easy to use especially with the dual burners. My only complaint is I can only get the temperature down to 200F. This was a big upgrade from a smaller electric model. The racks are heavy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hung it from the top hook and worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Started right out smoking a 15 lb pork belly. Hung it from the top hook and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: smoke trays warp and don't slide well
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome smoker! Fair warning - the smoke trays warp, they rarely fit under the water tray without absolute frustration, so you will fight, curse and sweat just to get the darn thing back under there when you add more wood chips. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Hard to contact the company for tech support.
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems with this smoker in the beginning and never was able to contact the company for support. This works OK but i wish it had a thermostatic control .
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN BOYNTON

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new at smoking but this smoker works great! My husband put it together and it took a while, he added the extra seal around the door according to another review. The inside temp is off about 10 degrees. With all said I smoked 2 11 pound pork butts and 1 beef brisket, it took about 20 hours and they turned out fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: This is my second smoker, the best investment that I’ve had for my grill. I use it almost everyday. Very easy to use and do not have to continue to watch all day. I make ribs,brisket, salmon, scallops and all different flavors of beef jerky. Very satisfied easy to put together easy to use. I did buy extra gasket seal .
customer_reviews.author: Rcco345

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used enough to decide on an overall rating.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I've purchased the first one I had to return because it arrived with damaged parts some from shipping and some from manufacturer. Well the second one had a few bent parts but was acceptable but the top door handle threads were stripped on the first unit and second unit. Masterbuilt are nearly impossible to contact. Nowadays customer service is nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Connor Jr

customer_reviews.title: Get a different smoker.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst smoker I have ever owned. Burners constantly go out, what it come with in the box doesn’t seal and it leaks smoke from everywhere. It won’t burn a pan of chips down to white ash due to the chip pan being to far away. You literally have to sit and Baby sit this smoker the whole time you cook on it. I don’t get anywhere close to the same smoke rings I would on the 4 other smokers I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Badly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to give a better review, but I'm unable to use it because the large handle isn't threaded correctly and after 3 weeks of emails, I cant get a response from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Nowgo29

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for multiple foods!
customer_reviews.text: We love this smoker. I got it for my boyfriend for his birthday and he’s so happy with it. It’s large enough that we can smoke numerous things. No complaints so far, except we wish it had wheels to move around more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY AWESOME SMOKER
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is a beast , i have had no problems with this smoker at all i really don't understand how people can give thus anything but 5 stars , My wife even smoked the Easter ham with thus smoker , we use it about 3 days a week I literally just ordered another one as a gift WE TOTALLY LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Jason Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful smoker! Purchased as present, the person has used it several times since receiving with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: T.Cerase

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our old smoker that did not hold the low temperature needed for great smoking results. Hubby is in smoking heaven, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: This smoker has made many meals for is and we haven't had a problem with it yet and is been almost a year. Good quality, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Cammi

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly with temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker! Have used it several times & love it! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda J

customer_reviews.title: Bog smoker for the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Big smoker with enough room to cook large turheys. Very nice assortment of racks. Even comes with a sausage hanger. Only downfall, but not too concerned about, is smoke escaping around the glass. Overall, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Frankenfield

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Two 76 year olds put it together in about 4 hours. Our Thanksgiving turkies were delicious. Will continue to enjoy this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Kay B

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one and still doesn't work. Tryed contacting manufacturer no response.
customer_reviews.author: colt5756

customer_reviews.title: Chinese  Junk.
customer_reviews.text: It's made out of thin sheet metal. Nothing lines up during assembly. No gasket on the door. Smoke and heat leaks out at every seam when masterbuilt took over smokehollow. They cheapened it. My old smokehollow had a insulated box and it was tight. The new was junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a home smoker, look no more!
customer_reviews.author: JJ-VI

customer_reviews.title: You definately want a gasket for the doors.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and damage free. Works great! You will want to install the recommended door gasket. The latches are adjustable so you can seal it fairly tight. It still leaks a bit but much better than having no gaskets at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Guru

customer_reviews.title: SIMPKY AWESOMENESS
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, less than an hour taking my time by myself- already have it up and running seasoning it getting it ready for actual food- LOVE IT ALREADY
customer_reviews.author: chris d

customer_reviews.title: Stock regulator runs too hot for smokin sausage. Buy an aftermarket adjustable regulator.
customer_reviews.text: The Stock regulator that comes with this unit only allows you to operate at around 220 deg or higher. To get it down to 135-145 I had to install a needle valve adjustable regulator. Took some tinkering and trial n error but was able to dial it in.
customer_reviews.author: DR. T

customer_reviews.title: Smoker won't stay lit
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker but One burner won't stay lit. Not safe. Waiting for Amazon response.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The Best Smoker Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every cent!! An excellent smoker! Highly recommended! Get one....you will love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good job.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time-1 day later than estimated. Easy to put together. Note: No gasket provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amateur

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this smoker we have used it several times and only had problems with the burner going out one time when it was getting ready to storm. Overall we have been nothing but satisfied with this product and how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk. One handle never assembled. Smoke leaks everywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. One handle never assembled. Smoke leaks everywhere. Small gusts of wind will blow out the burners. Chips do not fully burn. Can’t trust it to do briskets. Getting recycled!
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my Hubby, he LOVES it!!! Easy to use and amazing results!!! One of his favorite gifts ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Honeywell

customer_reviews.title: Good for 250 degree smoking
customer_reviews.text: The two burners have never worked together and can't get the heat high enough for chicken. One burner keeps going out and I've tried every fix I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a b-day present for my son. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Berthoud Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to regulate the temperature
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent box as long as you constantly babysit it where you have to keep messing with the burner dials to keep it within 10 degrees of the desired temp at all times.
customer_reviews.author: ctherc71

customer_reviews.title: Other than the hinge the u it looks good, I will have to update once I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the smoker, put it together, opened the door and the hinge fell off. How am I supposed to fix this? Other than the hinge the u it looks good, I will have to update once I can figure out how to get the hinge fixed so I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: well built
customer_reviews.text: awesome smoker ! very please with how it cooks !
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tino

customer_reviews.title: What a great smoker
customer_reviews.text: To smoke a 16 lb turkey and a 12 lb ham at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Randy O’Dell

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Used 3 times in the past year and now it no longer ignites
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Baker

customer_reviews.title: Ball of Fire
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it and put it together I fell in love with it. But I used it for the second time and my wife went to change the wood chips and a ball of fire burnt her face her arm in her hair
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Best smoker for home use.
customer_reviews.text: great smoker. This was a gift. I have been using this same smoker for years and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Two doors and glass on door are nice to have
customer_reviews.text: BIG, plenty of room and racks. Top door has a few leaks. Chip holders will bend after a few cycles. Two doors and glass on door are nice to have. Will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: ... this in a local retail store and fell in love immediately, but would not spend the money for ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband saw this in a local retail store and fell in love immediately, but would not spend the money for it. We do all of our own venison processing and he had grown out of his previous smoker. Seeing as he is so hard to buy for, I immediately knew what we would be getting him for this, his 45th birthday. The smoker has arrived, been assembled and has been seasoned and is now waiting for deer season to arrive. He is to antsy to use it, we may be buying some turkeys, ribs, and roasts just so he can use it before then.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker. Can not get temp below 210 with ...
customer_reviews.text: Good smoker . Can not get temp below 210 with two burners and with one uneven temp in side
customer_reviews.author: alphonso williams

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to regulate heat and to get wood to smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtkrusher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Water tray rack bows under heat. Maintains temperature well even on chilly days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. Used it one time and the rubber pulled away from the glass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping very poor construction. (And a 4 year later review).
customer_reviews.text: The ignitor does not light the left burner. Several chips in the ceramic coated parts. Very disappointed in the quality of this higher the average end smoker. It should have cast iron wood chip holders not cheap thin ceramic coated thin steal. Not worth the price. I would send it back if I would not have put it together and wasted my time and through the box out. Very poorly constructed as well. Needs a lot of tweaking and adjustments. Four years later update, i still have it, it still works. Been smoking ribs on it every few months. Make sure you follow the instructions on seasoning it.
customer_reviews.author: Dog0311USMC

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Arrived undamaged
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Arrived undamaged. I have assembled and seasoned so far. Only wish the chip trays were larger so I could use chunks rather than chips.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it....I have cooked ribs , chicken and a pork loin so far and they came out great
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but door handle wont tighten.
customer_reviews.text: I received my smoker yesterday and assembled it after work. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. The smoker looks great and I cant wait to try it but the main handle wont tighten up. The screws for it seem fine, it feels like the hole is too big for the screw. The lower door handle is fine but don't really like the idea of the handle coming off in my hand when I open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Erspamer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smoker. Works good for summer sausage
customer_reviews.author: Larry Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Great fully equipped smoker
customer_reviews.text: Great fully equipped smoker, some assembly required, but well worth it. I would recommend getting some gasket material for around the doors.
customer_reviews.author: audie twiford

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt 44241GW 2-Door Propane Gas Smoker with Window, 44-Inch, Black
product_meta.description: The Smoke Hollow 44" two-door smoker is equipped with: 2 -12, 000 BTU stainless steel burners which can be operated independently for optimum performance & temperature control. 7-Total cooking grids: 4 - standard grids 2 - jerky style grids 1 - rib rack 1 - sausage hanger The Smoke Hollow 44" Also features 2 wood chip pans to provide just the Right of amount of smoke flavor & a large porcelain-coated water pan. 6cu.'. Of capacity, can easily handle enough food for large gatherings.
feature_bullets: 6.5 cubic feet of cooking area capacity to easily handle enough food for largest gatherings
7 cooking grids: 4-standard cooking grids, 2-jerky grids, 1-rib rack 1-sausage Hanger
Dual door design with tempered glass viewing window.2 porcelain coated wood chip pans with lids.Temperature gauge.Easy adjustable smoke stack
Dual stainless Steel burners Operated independently operated for optimum performance and temperature control
Large porcelain coated water pan.Handles on the side for easy carry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
